## ğŸ Python Runtime Adapter

Inspect Python runtime environment and debug common issues with the new `python://` adapter!

**8 Endpoints:**
- `python://` - Environment overview
- `python://version` - Detailed version info
- `python://env` - Computed environment (sys.path, flags)
- `python://venv` - Virtual environment detection
- `python://packages` - List installed packages
- `python://packages/<name>` - Package details
- `python://imports` - Loaded modules
- `python://debug/bytecode` - Detect stale .pyc files â­

**Example:**
```bash
reveal python://                  # Quick environment check
reveal python://debug/bytecode    # Fix "my changes aren't working!"
reveal python://packages          # List all packages
```

**Separation of Concerns:**
- `env://` â†’ Raw environment variables (cross-language)
- `ast://` â†’ Static code analysis (cross-language)
- `python://` â†’ Python runtime inspection (Python-specific) âœ¨

---

## ğŸ“š Help System Redesign

Agent help redesigned for progressive discovery:

**New Architecture:**
- `--agent-help` - Brief guide (85% smaller, teaches `help://` pattern)
- `help://` - Progressive discovery (always up-to-date)
- `--agent-help-full` - Complete offline reference

**Token Efficiency:**
- Old: ~11,000 tokens
- New: ~1,500 tokens (quick start) or ~50-500 (progressive via `help://`)

**Example:**
```bash
reveal help://                # Discover all adapters
reveal help://python          # Learn python:// adapter
reveal python://              # Use it!
```

## ğŸ› Pipeline Fixes

Fixed BrokenPipeError when piping output:
```bash
reveal python://packages | head -30  # âœ… Now works!
```
